title: Macna Cooling Vest Evo
features: Evaporative cooling technology — up to 15°C temp drop
Soak in water for 2 minutes to activate
Cooling effect lasts 8-20 hours depending on humidity
description: Beat the heat with the Macna Cooling Vest Evo. Simply soak it in water for 2 minutes and wear it under your jacket — the evaporative cooling technology drops your body temperature by up to 15°C. Essential for summer riding in tropical and hot climates. The slim-profile design fits under any motorcycle jacket without adding bulk.
